title: "People with hearing prostheses use timbre of voice to recognise emotions"
excerpt: "Cochlear implants can help people with hearing loss to perceive acoustic stimuli. Unlike hearing aids, which usually only amplify the volume of sounds, the electronic prostheses directly stimulate the auditory nerve."
